subject: Re: with module fglrx loaded hibernate crashes my system
body:
Hi,

On Fri, 22 Jun 2007, Gerard Robin wrote:

> I installed fglrx-driver and when I load the module fglrx if my laptop
> hibernate my system crashes. 
> Is there a solution to solve this problem or must I disable definitively
> the module fglrx ?
> 
> I run unstable, 2.6.18-4-amd64, on a laptop acer aspire 5102wmli

what kind of crash? is it crashign before suspend, or after? or is the
display just dark? how do you suspend?
